name: WHELM (RPOVERWHELMING)
description:
mouse1 shoot

mouse2 only on sniper to aim for increased damage

shift sprint

pistol is doubled at half ammo or less, rifle deals slightly more damage at high ammo, rocket launcher heals per enemy hit, sniper can be aimed at for greater damage, but aim animation is slow

Would like feedback, not on the environment, but on weapon design and ideas.
